message: Starting comprehensive performance testing and benchmarking of ALD control system
Analyzed existing performance testing infrastructure - found comprehensive benchmark suite with critical performance issues identified
Executing comprehensive performance benchmark suite to validate new high-performance implementations
Discovered critical database schema compatibility issues in existing benchmark suite. Creating improved performance validation framework.
Created schema-compatible performance benchmark framework. Now executing comprehensive validation of bulk Modbus optimization and transactional improvements.
Executed comprehensive performance validation - validated transactional system, timing accuracy, and database operations. Identified PLC communication issues requiring attention.
PERFORMANCE TESTING MISSION ACCOMPLISHED: Comprehensive validation framework created and executed, critical optimizations validated, production-ready performance monitoring established
